text:
Jerry Adriani (Jair Alves de Sousa; 29 January 1947 – 23 April 2017) was a Brazilian singer, musician and actor. He began his career in television while working with Rede Tupi in São Paulo. His early works were as a vocalist for the group "Os Rebeldes".
Adriani died at a hospital in Rio de Janeiro from cancer on 23 April 2017, aged 70.
